title: #115 Waverly Hills

description:
Thank you to Jean for your story in this episode!


Promo: Deadly Debbie’s Creepy Files

https://www.deadlydebbie.com


Follow Dan on twitch:

twitch.tv/miloskiba


Support us on Patreon:

https://www.patreon.com/reallifeghoststories


Visit our website:

https://www.reallifeghoststoriespodcast.com


Research Links:


Wikipedia Page:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Waverly_Hills_Sanatorium


Timmy and Mary story:

http://www.waverlyseance.com/music-box/


The Ghosts of Waverly Hills by Christy Gordon Oct 18th 2013

https://mysteriousuniverse.org/2013/10/the-ghosts-of-waverly-hills/


The Incredibly Haunted Waverly Hills Sanatorium by Brent Swancer Dec 31st 2020

https://mysteriousuniverse.org/2020/12/the-incredibly-haunted-waverly-hills-sanatorium/


A lecture on TB and Waverly Hills by Dr Lynn Pohl

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HSZ52aV2HRM


Waverly Hills Sanitorium - Kentucky's Hospital of the Damned by Troy Taylor

https://www.americanhauntingsink.com/waverlytb


The 6 Scariest Things at Waverly by George Lindsey 26th Oct 2011

https://www.louisville.com/content/6-scariest-things-waverly-hills-halloween


Haunted Encounters at Waverly Hills Sanitorium by Rick Hinton 14th May 2020

https://ss-times.com/haunted-encounters-at-waverly-hills-sanitorium/


Story by Joey (2007) submitted to Real Ghost Tales

https://www.trueghosttales.com/stories/waverly-hills-sanitarium.php


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
